author: Special Correspondent
title: Rahul Gandhi calls for ideas on possible MSME stimulus package
description: COVID-19 has devastated the sector, he says on social media
content:
Former Congress president Rahul Gandhi has called for ideas on a possible stimulus package for the medium, small and micro enterprises (MSME) sector on social media. 
#COVID19 has devastated our micro, small & medium businesses (MSME). The Congress party… [+452 chars]
